attributes.action: Put a final stop to the entry of illegal immigrants entering the country .
attributes.additional_details: Because they have been telling the British public, lies and ignoring the severity of the problem.
attributes.background: To honour its election manifesto by reducing immigration, and sack the home secretary for failing in her position.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action:

Take action to prevent illegal attempts to enter the UK
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/579552

We also can't accept petitions about appointments. That includes calling for a Minister to be removed from their job.
